title: Design of Integrated Technology-Based Science Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary scientific knowledge and experience with digital device usage
context.additional_context: Design considerations required for smartphone-centric accessibility and limited technological environments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the principles of scientific concepts with over 80% accuracy using a mobile-optimized LMS.
Learners perform scientific problem-solving processes with peers through online collaboration tools at least three times.
Learners achieve at least 70% proficiency in their final assignments via a digital assessment system.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
